author: jsdelfino
msg: Add support for user and email component properties, and minimal support for sign in using OpenID.

author: rahul
msg: Ignore target directory (produced by m2 build).

author: rahul
msg: Add a website for the scxml-js project:
* The m2 POM is currently used purely for building the site
* Simple site.xml is added, can be improved as docs etc. become available as part of the site
* A stub changes.xml is provided (TBD whether to maintain this)
* Basic homepage includes a blurb from the README
* Issue tracking page via 'mvn commons:jira-page' (note: we use the SCXML JIRA component, not sandbox)
